do well.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to be successful, especially in work or business
do well.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: He’s doing very well at college.
Elizabeth’s done well for herself since she moved to London.
do well.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if someone who has been ill is doing well, they are becoming healthy again
do well.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: He had the operation yesterday, and he’s doing very well.
